pullRequest.title: [7.10][DOCS] Adds UI related limitation to configuring aggs docs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Overview
This PR adds a UI related limitation to the Requirements and limitations section of the Aggregating data for faster performance doc. The limitation is about aggregation types in ML jobs that are not supported by the Single Metric Viewer in Kibana.
Applies to 7.10 and below.
(#65184 handles 7.11 and above.)
Preview
Requirements and limitations

commit.message: [7.10][DOCS] Adds UI related limitation to configuring aggs docs.

nodes.bodyText: This limitation also applies to the anomaly charts in the Anomaly Explorer, with or without model plot enabled for 7.10.
